item.title: Introduction to Complex Systems Approaches in Public Health
item.author: adrigabzu@sund.ku.dk (Adrian G. Zucco)
item.description: PhD course to be held in May 2025. The course places great emphasis on the practical application of the Health Complexity Framework, which serves as a fundamental tool for conducting complexity research in the field of public health. Lecturer on pattern recognition in epidemiology and public health.
